enhanced_by.reason: ParameterChecker.checkParameter is used to validate mandatory parameters before executing the transfer.
ParameterChecker.checkRequiredParameter ensures that required parameters are present before proceeding with the transfer.
futuresTransferHistory can be used to verify the transfer history and ensure that the transfer was successfully recorded.

enhanced_by.method_name: requestHandler.sendSignedRequest(String, String, Map<String, Object>, HttpMethod, boolean)
enhanced_by.reason: The response from requestHandler.sendSignedRequest can be used to assert the success or failure of the transfer request.
